title: Place value: ones, tens, hundreds. - 2nd ed.
brief_description: Paul shows Judy how to group pennies into tens and hundreds in order to count them. Small card holders are used to record and demonstrate the meaning of place value. Teacher-parent film on infant mathematics. Suitable for lower primary and teacher levels.
